WindowVrdisplaydeactivate_event.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The vrdisplaydeactivate event of the WebVR API is fired when a VR display can no longer be presented to, for example if an HMD has gone into standby or sleep mode due to a period of inactivity.

blockquote.para: Note: This event was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
